item.title: First Post
item.description:
Why I Started This

Decided to put my spare time to better use (than playing Witcher 3 and Hearthstone), and start writing some technical articles. This would be a good opportunity for me to do some research into things I never dedicate enough time to understand, and hopefully benefit whoever chances upon this little blog :)

Also I haven’t tried to start a website for ~3 years now, and it’s unbelievably easy to spin up something like this. No wonder everyone has their own blog these days and they all look so pretty (I’m currently using Hugo, Github Pages and Namecheap for this site).
